nodes.text: The Hurricane 506 Cloud Car was a model of Bespin Motors Twin-Pod Cloud Car. In the Hurricane configuration, one pod was used for pilot and co-pilot, while the other contains the power generators needed to power the weapons and engines. Because of this configuration, the Hurricane tended to roll to the left during acceleration. The Hurricane was a predecessor of the Storm IV Twin-Pod cloud car. A dozen Hurricanes were used by Notsub Security on Tatooine circa 0 ABY.
